text: Ngon malaikat dum le sileupah Malaikat dum jak keudeh keunoe Takalon laloe dilingka â€˜arasy Ucap teuseubeh geupujoe Tuhan Yohnyan putusan Neubri le Allah Beuna ngon ade putusan Tuhan Geukheun le yohnyan al-Hamdulillah Sigala pujoe meuwoe keu Tuhan Nyang Po dum alam deungon blah bicah AL-MUKMIN (UREUENG MEUIMAN) Ngon nama Allah lon puphon surat Tuhan Hadharat nyang Maha Murah Tuhanku sidroe geumaseh that-that Donya akhirat rahmat Neulimpah
